snippet.title: The Wolf Of Derevnya Trailer
snippet.description:
Find the werewolf. Stop the killings. Save the village. The Wolf of Derevnya is a survival-horror choose your own adventure set in medieval Russia. Out now on Steam and Itch!

Get it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2184220/The_Wolf_of_Derevnya/

Get it on Itch: https://nightwellgames.itch.io/wolf-of-derevnya
